short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between dota stat site pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that allows you to switch between relative pages on various Dota 2 stat websites, as well as steam profiles. Pages can be launched in either the same tab, or a new one.
